job.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job.description: We’re hiring for a rapidly growing series A startup, who are developing an autonomous vehicle using “shared autonomy”. The company’s platform combines robotics, computer vision and machine learning and it’s here to revolutionize their $12 billion market.They’re looking for a Machine Learning Engineer to design and deliver their new autonomous vehicle.If you are passionate about cutting edge machine learning, robotics and having real-world impact – this could be the place for you!You will:Design and train neural networksDesign, train and verify robust machine learning systemsProvide technical leadershipWrite maintainable code, design software and deploy machine learning modelsCollaborate with other members of the teamYou have:PhD or Master’s degree in Computer Science or related fieldExperience in reinforcement learning, machine learning or optimization theory3+ years of hands-on experienceExpertise with deep learning frameworks (PyTorch, Tensorflow, Keras)Experience developing machine learning systemsExpertise in Python and C++Excellent communication skillsBig Cloud is acting as a vendor to this position which is a direct hire.
